Instruction: 'Halve the avocados and remove the pits.'
'Scoop the avocado flesh into a bowl and mash with a fork.'
'Juice the lime and add it to the mashed avocado.'
Dice the red onion, tomato, cilantro, and jalapeno pepper.'
Add diced red onion, tomato, cilantro, and jalapeno pepper to the mashed avocado.'
'Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.'
'Serve chilled with tortilla chips or as a topping for tacos.'
